info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 03 at 9:23PM MST by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...An intense snow shower will impact portions of northern Lemhi, east central Idaho and southern Ravalli Counties through 1015 PM MST... At 923 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking an intense snow shower near Conner, or 17 miles south of Hamilton, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Visibility one-quarter mile or less. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Low visibility could result in dangerous driving conditions. Locations impacted include... Darby, Conner, Sula, Lost Trail Pass, Charlos Heights and Como. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
